amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Reissue Revised Statutes of Nebraska
amendatorysection.para: The Uniform Commercial Code became operative at midnight on September 1, 1965. It applies to transactions entered into and events occurring after that date.

annotation.para: This effective date is suggested so that there may be ample time for all those who will be affected by the provisions of the code to become familiar with them.
